# looklove_c64
## simple game in c64 BASIC
![lookoflove.png](lookoflove.png)

### get all the hearts,  avoid the trees and edges
* i -- moves up
* k -- moves down
* j -- moves left
* l -- moves right

* if you die.  just type run and enter


[play the game in an online editor](https://vice.janicek.co/c64/index.html#%7B%22controlPort2%22%3A%22joystick%22%2C%22primaryControlPort%22%3A2%2C%22keys%22%3A%7B%22SPACE%22%3A%22%22%2C%22RETURN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22F1%22%3A%22%22%2C%22F3%22%3A%22%22%2C%22F5%22%3A%22%22%2C%22F7%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%22files%22%3A%7B%22looklove.prg%22%3A%22data%3Aapplication%2Foctet-stream%3Bbase64%%%2FgGZICJHQU1FIE9WRVIiABgMCAKZICJTQ09SRSIsUwAeDBICgAAoDFgCmSKTIjsARwxiApkgIllPVSBHT1QgQUxMIFRIIExPVkUhISEiAFcMbAKZICJTQ09SRSIsUwAAAA%3D%3D%22%7D%2C%22vice%22%3A%7B%22-autostart%22%3A%22looklove.prg%22%7D%7D)
